title: Whenever people say that Vladimir's the most cancerous Champion in the game...
body:
http://i.imgur.com/xOApKgw.gif

Especially post-rework. Basically did nothing but add counterplay to Q and E and a bit of oomph to Haemoplague.

replies.body: {{champion:105}} I {{champion:64}} Don't {{champion:7}} Know {{champion:39}} What {{champion:81}} You {{champion:53}} Are {{champion:432}} Talking {{champion:245}} About
Brad is cancerous?
yep. a good bard is cancer for the other team, a bad one is cancer for his team
did somebody say teemo?

The main thing is that his stun often connects to things when it really shouldn't.... 
His Q is a really punishing spell when it does hit stun you, so when it does those weird interactions it's really frustrating to deal with.

He also deals a fuck ton of damage for a support, but that's mainly annoying because you're not expecting it, so I'm kinda fine with that lol
The ult, the E to Q when people follow probably is the reason why

Mainly the fact that his Q stuns you when it really, really, shouldn't.
The angle and length of the particles look pretty rediculous in those situations.
bard is like a ultra slower, in late games i can get 6 meeps wich means that my basics, plus my q, plus exaust and enemy slowing items its free win

{{champion:105}}  I {{champion:13}}  don't {{champion:238}}  Know{{champion:39}} What{{champion:83}} you{{champion:67}} are{{champion:92}} Talking{{champion:77}} About

There corrected it for you

{{champion:64}} {{champion:7}} {{champion:53}} {{champion:245}} deserve their spots more than {{champion:77}} {{champion:83}} for sure. 
Zed Vayne, Riven and Ryze are arguable.
Yorick is easily the most cancer he just has such terrible numbers that it doesn't matter.
Have you played when {{champion:83}} was strong? He's the most deserving of all champs to be on that list. He's the only champ Riot intentionally keeps weak nowadays

Yorick walks into a bar 
There is no counter

Eve is another. The only reason she's in a 'reasonable' spot is because she can jungle. 

Most of the pre-rework diamond poppy mains played her in the jungle as well.

> [{quoted}](name=RoodToob,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=eTOZQJYB,comment-id=0001000000010000,timestamp=2016-06-26T15:38:41.695+0000)
>
> Have you played when {{champion:83}} was strong? He's the most deserving of all champs to be on that list. He's the only champ Riot intentionally keeps weak nowadays

Urgot? Eve? Azir in non pro play?
lol urgot weak
Ez is a different kind of cancer. put him back on the list.

Ez is responsible for change/removal of multiple Sheen items, which usually turned out to be a problem for other Sheen-reliant champions.

Also he is one of those champions, who always come back into popularity. He has phases were he is not played as much, but he will always reappear - be it on bot or mid-lane. 
And during his stronger phases it can be really frustrating to play against his kit.

Ez is responsible for the removal/nerfing of many items in general 
Especially jungle items
how are Bard and Ezreal cancer ?

Bard:

> Mainly the fact that his Q stuns you when it really, really, shouldn't.

Ezreal is just really unfun for melee champions with his constant slows and free flash.
He also has top damage dealt to champions in almost every game because of his Muramana Q poke.

{{champion:131}} {{champion:245}} {{champion:60}} {{champion:114}} {{champion:105}} {{champion:39}} {{champion:121}} {{champion:64}} {{champion:11}} {{champion:2}} {{champion:80}} {{champion:56}} {{champion:58}} {{champion:107}}
Just a few of the melee champions that can deal with Ezreal's mobility and IBG CC pretty easily and outdamage him.

I don't think you understand what it means when something is called "cancer". It's not that it has a high win or ban rate. It's not when it can't be dealt with. It's when it has a negative impact on the overall game.

Ezreal has caused a LOT of changes to the game that were taken to keep him in line, and still caused other champions to fare worse. Remember that Spirit of the Elder Lizard item? And how it got nerfed to shit because Ezreal was taking it in lane and abusing it? It got nerfed because of Ezreal, even though it was created specifically for AD junglers - something Ezreal wasn't even doing with it.

> [{quoted}](name=Tides of Blood,realm=EUW,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=eTOZQJYB,comment-id=,timestamp=2016-06-26T13:41:50.530+0000)
>
> http://i.imgur.com/xOApKgw.gif?noredict

Yup.
http://static1.businessinsider.com/image/5720ec15910584cc008bf5c2/heres-the-insane-diet-the-mountain-actor-from-game-of-thrones-is-on-for-worlds-strongest-man.jpg
{{champion:105}}

{{champion:238}} When played right
I cannot for the life of me get more than 5 kills in a game when playing Zed

Thresh actually sucks

People only QQ about Irelia because of item changes making her easy, a good Irelia player could do the same thing before buff

> Thresh actually sucks


No...just stop.
explain to me how he's "op cancer"

He's not OP, but a lot of people consider his kit to be cancer because it's still really overloaded, which makes him really versatile. He can be an engage champ (with Hook, Flay, and lantern to bring in teammates), a disengage champ (flay, lantern, ult), a pick champ with single target CC and gap closers, a team fight champ (damn near his entire kit), he cannot directly heal BUT because he benefits from HP as a stat and has flay passive to abuse for procs so he can build relic shield+ to provide in lane sustain, he can all-in during lane, he can harass in lane because of range and flay passive. He can build tank, utliity, dmg, whatever the situation calls for and be relatively okay. Hell he can even build ADC/crit and one shot people.

He just brings so much to the table that, even after his numbers were shafted and he lost his OP status, he can still be really frustrating to play against.

He's overloaded and he can do a lot of things, but he's not good enough at any one thing to be op right now.

Matter of fact they are buffing him next patch
I literally started off by saying he wasn't OP, so I'm not sure why you're trying to argue that.
Nowhere is it said that he's "op cancer", he's just saying that Thresh tilits him ...
Hmmm what's this....{{item:3033}}.... nah it looks stupid, red is my favorite color anyway.
black and white*
Hi I'm Vlad, I'm 4% HP and in hourglass active, I just instacasted my E somehow and healed up 70% on my health and dealt half your health.
https://media.giphy.com/media/lG8vPNA7slpwA/giphy.gif
No, that's exactly what happened. Literally from 4% to 70% and killed me from half HP as a Twitch.

The only way Vlad's going from 4-70% is with a full build Crimson Rush and at least three-person ult. If he's full build enough to heal that much, you ought to have {{item:3033}} if you're playing Twitch.

And if you are indeed playing Twitch, why are you surprised that you took so much damage? You're playing the inherently squishiest class in the game.

Because Kayle is such a perfect example of balance with meaningful counterplay and fun interaction for both parties.
*Mandatory Kappa*
Sure Kayle it, bait the ult, it's not like she can use it under hard CC (Hi Tryndamere) and it's not like she has escape mechanics (Hi Azir).

>  it's not like she can use it under hard CC (Hi Tryndamere) and it's not like she has escape mechanics (Hi Azir).

FUCK NO!!
Kayle has enough counterplay issues in her current state!
Would be a shame if his E didn't heal him but rather took his health away. ;            ^)
Vlad transmits aids not cancer, why people not understand cancer isn't transmittal kappa

Precisely. They made his Q and E do more damage, but in the perfect circumstances, and made it easier to avoid a lot of his damage output. People just haven't figured out how to play against Vlad lmao
http://66.media.tumblr.com/tumblr_lz9jddYW5Y1rn95k2o1_400.gif
